title: Display fonts were all crazy about -\_-
content:
Any ideas guys? Any help will be appreciated. Thanks

Font: 

 Jacques and Gilles & The Hand (Bold) by Julien Saurin and Fanny Coulez [La Goupil, 2013] 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112625/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| --- | --- |

author: LukeVicious

comments.content:
Thank You is Jacques and Gilles:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/jacques-and-gilles/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/jacques-and-gilles/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/jacques-and-gilles/")

The thin sans will take me a bit longer.....
"FROM THE SOON TO BE" is **[The Hand (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/la-goupil/the-hand/)** by Julien Saurin and Fanny Coulez [La Goupil, 2013]

Liebe Erica comes close to the sans, but not quite:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/liebe-fonts/liebe-erika/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/liebe-fonts/liebe-erika/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/liebe-fonts/liebe-erika/")

EDIT: Fivos for the win...
